data.title: Today's latest from Al Jazeera
data.meta_description: Stay on top of Slovakia latest developments on the ground with Al Jazeera’s fact-based news, exclusive video footage, photos and updated maps.
data.text:
Content Feed

Court near Bratislava rules that man accused in assassination attempt will be held in custody.

play-arrowVideo Duration 02 minutes 11 seconds 02:11

Robert Fico remains in serious condition, officials say, after being shot in attack that sent shockwaves across Europe.

A top minister warns the country is ‘on the edge of a civil war’ as political polarisation reaches dangerous heights.

Interior minister says suspect charged with attempted murder is ‘lone wolf’ who had joined anti-government protests.

play-arrowVideo Duration 02 minutes 05 seconds 02:05

The Slovak prime minister was shot multiple times on Wednesday in an assassination attempt.

play-arrowVideo Duration 06 minutes 12 seconds 06:12

World leaders decry attack against Fico, who was shot several times and is in ‘life-threatening condition’.

Prime minister hospitalised after being shot multiple times in Slovak town of Handlova.

play-arrowVideo Duration 06 minutes 12 seconds 06:12

Slovak prime minister taken to hospital as President Zuzana Caputova condemns ‘brutal and ruthless’ attack.

play-arrowVideo Duration 00 minutes 58 seconds 00:58

Europe’s courts refuse to prosecute police officers who abuse Roma even when their crimes are caught on video.

quotes

Parliament Speaker Peter Pellegrini wins second round of presidential election, cementing grip of the pro-Russian PM.
